location.zh-cn: 杭州市西湖区省府路8号一号楼
location.en: Building 1, No. 8 Shengfu Road, Xihu District, Hangzhou

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省的地方级国家权力机关，行政级别为正省级。
description.en: The local state power organ of Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China, with a provincial administrative level.

nodes.id: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会的常设机构。
description.en: The standing committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，浙江省是其下辖的一个省份。
description.en: A country in East Asia, of which Zhejiang is a province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法，是设立浙江省人民代表大会的法源。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China, which is the legal source for the establishment of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国地方各级人民代表大会和地方各级人民政府组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国地方各级人民代表大会和地方各级人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 规定浙江省人民代表大会等地方权力机关组织架构的法律。
description.en: The law that specifies the organizational structure of local power organs such as the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任浙江省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任浙江省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。曾任浙江省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. Formerly served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.source: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会是浙江省人民代表大会的常设机构。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress is the permanent body of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省人民代表大会是浙江省的地方级国家权力机关。
description.en: The Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress is the local state power organ of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国宪法》是设立浙江省人民代表大会的授权法源。
description.en: The Constitution of the People's Republic of China is the authorizing legal source for the establishment of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国地方各级人民代表大会和地方各级人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国地方各级人民代表大会和地方各级人民政府组织法》是浙江省人民代表大会的组织法规。
description.en: The 'Organic Law of the Local People's Congresses and Local People's Governments of the People's Republic of China' serves as the organizational regulation for the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.
